Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/68th
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 67th, Racine, 69th and Ashland: due to, street blockage near Ashland/68th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 67th, Racine, 69th and Ashland: due to, street blockage near Ashland/68th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
